text: The LIU Sharks men's ice hockey team represents Long Island University in NCAA Division I ice hockey. The school announced their intention to begin a varsity schedule for the 2020–21 season on April 30, 2020. At the time of their announcement the Sharks would be the 61st active program at the division I level and the only one located in New York City. ==Roster== As of October 8, 2020. |} ==See also== *LIU Sharks women's ice hockey ==References== ==External links== Category:Ice hockey teams in New York (state)
title: LIU Sharks men's ice hockey
